Title: Relates to the powers and duties of enforcement officers
Summary: Provides that within twenty-four hours of any search or seizure undertaken without a warrant, the enforcement officer shall file with the court an affidavit or sworn statement describing the basis for probable cause justifying the places  that were searched and the items that were seized.
LawCode: Amd ยง71-0907, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the powers and duties of enforcement officers
